name: The Arcade (Link 14)
description:
Welcome to the Bitsy Arcade! Here you can replay those classics from the 80's, by entering into them! Yes, you can enter IN the games! What are you waiting for? Go, play my game! There are 3 different endings.

(You will see "!" symbols. You can interact with them to get information of the Games. Also, the order you enter into them is established. You only can enter into the game that has the "!" symbol.) 

ADVICE:

(This game is not normal. It has dark topics.)

Controls:

In computer: WASD or arrow keys to move and interact. 

In mobile mode: Slide your finger to move and interact. Tap to pass the dialogues.

I hope you enjoy my little game ;)
